summary: This test module validates the PyTorch Lightning demonstration examples by providing automated checks: one ensures the sequence sampling utility used in the LSTM demo generates correct sequential batches, and another confirms that the Transformer demo can be successfully compiled with torch.compile without raising errors.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the demo code so that users and developers can rely on the examples to run properly, facilitating learning and preventing regressions in future updates.
